SIDE EFFECTS FOR TRIMETHOPRIM: The main problem that I have had with this medicine is that it only has had a very weak effect against the infection. Feeling very unwell, I get the medical appointment and start on the medicine only to find it does not really work. Maybe it slows the infection,  I am not sure.  I have then suffered a very unpleasant 3 days, before getting a further medical appointment to be put on a different antibiotic

REASON: some stomach upset at the beginning made sure had with full meal. settled down after few days. worked well on uti

SIDE EFFECTS FOR TRIMETHOPRIM: Very good and easy to deal with side effect.
